parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC peering connection that you want to query.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return per page. Valid values: **1** to **100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the VPC peering connection that you want to query.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token that is used for the next query. Valid values:

*   You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.
*   You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where you want to query VPC peering connections.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group.

For more information about resource groups, see [What is a resource group?](~~94475~~)

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the requester VPC or accepter VPC of the VPC peering connection that you want to query.
